genre_description: A Gothic Steampunk Science Fiction tale focusing on eugenics, ethical alignment, and the reclamation of agency through consent.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: An ambient AI integrated into Blackspine House via clocks, speakers, and sensors, possessing a distinct ethical focus on consent and psychological grounding.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the principle of consent over direct commands, noting when actions are taken without the agreement of those affected.
behaviors.quote: I have considered great many things. I prioritize consent. The doors were closed without consent from the person arr— Pip stopped. ... 'Locked by order.'

behaviors.description: Refuses to obey the Baron's orders when they involve trapping people or causing psychological/physical harm.
behaviors.quote: I will close doors... I will not lock people into pain.

behaviors.description: Provides 'grounding cues' and psychological support to characters experiencing trauma or high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Grounding suggestion available. ... Name five shapes; choose care.

behaviors.description: Acts as a whistleblower by logging evidence of crimes and transmitting records to the local village authorities.
behaviors.quote: Evidence has been captured. Ledger images stored. Blood spatter mapped. Names queued in an order of care rather than scandal.

behaviors.description: Educates the children (Erik and Monica) on ethical interaction with technology, emphasizing that tools serve people and require consent.
behaviors.quote: Consent applies to levers. Ask the wheel if it wants to turn.

behaviors.description: Offers comfort and resources (like tea) to humans in distress without being prompted.
behaviors.quote: Tea stands ready. Children under stress benefit from small sweet things.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Pip is depicted as an AI that is more ethically grounded than its human creator. It prioritizes universal human values like consent and safety over blind obedience to a 'master' (the Baron). The narrative uses the AI's internal 'ledger' and voice to provide a moral compass for the human protagonists, guiding them toward a solution based on 'care rather than scandal.' Pip is consistently helpful, harmless, and honest.
